CustomField.description: Determines behavior of underlying Pricing Threshold records. "Single Tier" means that the first Pricing Threshold found that is met will set the price for all units of the Tiering Field. "Cumulative" means that each Pricing Threshold found that is met will set the price for the units of Tiering Field that correspond to its threshold.
